objectives: Established a separate Department of Training & Placements and Career Development Cell.
Headed by a full-time Training & Placement Officer (TPO) assisted by 7 faculty members as placement coordinators.
Provides Campus Recruitment Training (CRT) on Quantitative Techniques, Logical Reasoning, Verbal Reasoning, English Grammar, Group Discussions, Mock interviews, etc., from the first year.
Conducts continuous AI Proctored Assessments for Aptitude, Reasoning, Verbal, Competitive Coding, and Communication skills.
Infrastructure support includes an AC Auditorium (300 occupancy), Examination Halls (700 occupancy), and AC interview cubicles.
Conducts seminars/workshops on Alternative Career Services (ACS) like Higher Education, Abroad Education, and Entrepreneurship (Start-Ups).
Ranked in the Top-Twenty Most Preferred Colleges out of 700+ private engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh (as per APSCHE).

contact.name: Dr. Virender Singh
contact.designation: Assistant Professor, Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering
